body:
### The Idea
The idea is to gather a community and do regular meet-ups in the Copenhagen area, for people with an interest in JVM related stuff. This would be both "full stack" – meaning everything from type theory to mechanical sympathy and JVM internals – and polyglot in the sense that any programming language that runs on or is somehow involved with the JVM, would be welcome.

 * The meet-up starts at 17:00
 * Presentations are usually in Danish
 * Presentations can be anywhere from 15 minutes to an hour long

### Schedule

Next meet-up is November 28, 17:00 at Schantz, Kigkurren 10, DK-2300 København S.

 * [ScalaCheck](https://github.com/rickynils/scalacheck), by [Mads Hartmann](https://twitter.com/Mads_Hartmann)
 * Optimising [Stormpot](http://chrisvest.github.com/stormpot/), by [Christian Vest Hansen](https://twitter.com/chvest)
 * *More speakers wanted. Want to try? Tell [Chris](mailto://mr.chrisvest@gmail.com)*
name: Copenhagen JVM Interest Group
